title: The Story of Two Engaged Childhood Friends Trying to Fall in Love - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Early Romance   Engagement   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: Hizuki Nagi   緋月薙
description:
Yuuya Toba, a hardworking son of a distinguished family, and Mizuki Fushimi, a girl that seems like an untouchable goddess on the outside, but is actually a friendly person. These two have been living together since they entered high school, and are so close that others refer to them as a married couple. 
They’re too close to hold hands, and too embarrassed to try romance… Huh?!

“‘Married couple’, you might call it, but ‘more than friends but less than lovers’? Not a chance!”

This is the story of two amateurs at love… the story of a couple that doesn’t think they’re a couple making progress in their relationship!
>
